name: Sticky Tiles
description: I am a solo dev and this was my very first 48 hour Game Jam. I was only apart of two other Game Jam's in the past and this was by far the most fun and challenging. I have never made an isometric style game before so I wanted to use this as a learning experience and try something new. I have also never made a puzzle game so I wanted to see how well I could do with level design. I hope everyone enjoys the few levels I was able to make in the amount of time we had, I cannot wait for this jam to come around again next year!
